title: Game update
body:
I really don't understand why i disconnected for the last few minutes of my game just for it to close and "update".

My team ended up winning the game while i was disconnected and i received the leaver penalty of losing LP for a victory.

Seriously, how the heck was i even able to play the game without updating it in the first place, but needed an update later.

replies.body: Sorry you got left out in this one.  :(  The client is not enabled to update you in the middle of a game, it would check for a patch before using the matchmaking server so this is pretty strange.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into your issue directly and see what happened.
